jparsec.model.DustOpacity

  • Packages that use DustOpacity 
    Package Description
    jparsec.model
    Basic models in astrophysics.

    • Uses of DustOpacity in jparsec.model

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DustOpacity[] DustOpacity.solveDustModel(DustOpacity[] dust, double[] waves, int np)
      Solves a dust model returning the set of opacities.

      Solves a dust model returning the set of opacities.
      static DustOpacity DustOpacity.tranformDustModelToSingleGrain(DustOpacity[] dustModel)
      Transforms a set of DustOpacity objects into a sole object, equivalent to the corresponding mixture of grains.

      Obtains the cross sections for absorption, scattering, and extinction of dust for a given size distribution.

      Returns a chart with the opacity as function of wavelength for 2 grains.
      static double DustOpacity.getTotalOpacity(DustOpacity[] dust, int index, double T)
      Obtains the total opacity of a given mixture of grains.
